item.title: Understanding the Basics of Cybersecurity
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Understanding the Basics of Cybersecurity" , "Importance of Cybersecurity" , "Protecting Personal Information" , "Safeguarding Business Data" , "National Security Concerns" , "Key Cybersecurity Terminology" , "Types of Cyber Attacks" , "Cybersecurity Best Practices" , "Role of Encryption in Cybersecurity" , "Cybersecurity for Businesses"
item.description: Discover the importance of cybersecurity and learn how to protect personal, business, and national security against evolving cyber threats.
